Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
SmartNode Alexa skill is used to control any of the appliances connected to SmartNode hardware through your voice. 

SmartNode Lighting module can be installed to turn on/off or dim appliances like light, fan, AC and many more, using Alexa.

SmartNode Curtain module can be installed to open or close any type of curtains, using Alexa.

SmartNode IR Blaster can be installed to control TV, AC and many other appliances which can be controlled by an IR Remote, using Alexa.

SmartNode RGB module can be installed to change colour or adjust brightness of an RGB Strip, using Alexa

Important : It is necessary for a user to create a SmartNode account on SmartNode application and add of the SmartNode devices in their SmartNode application before enabling SmartNode Alexa Skill. It is also preferable to rename the switches and all devices before enabling SmartNode Alexa Skill. 

Steps:
1. User needs to enable the SmartNode skill
2. Then user needs to sign in to their SmartNode account to link Alexa skill will SmartNode
3. After successful linking, user needs to discover devices to start the integration with SmartNode devices
4. A list of all linked devices appears in the Alexa app
5. User then can access all of these devices using voice commands

User can also create groups of their preferred devices in Alexa app to control them on a single command.
